entry.title: The Buttered Cat Paradox
entry.summary:
Author: writersagainstwritersblock

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,948Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 255

Summary: “No comment.”“You don’t know what I was going to ask,” Clark said with a hint of a smile. “Maybe I just wanted to congratulate you on catching the Film Freak.”Bruce gave him a flat look.“Or maybe I think I can help.”“With a case of vandalism?”Clark stepped in front of him. “It’s not vandalism and you know it, detective.”“And what makes you say that?”“If it were vandalism it would be something a lot more juvenile. To the point. It wouldn’t claim there were seventeen missing kids. That’s public outcry.”“Is that so?”“That and I tried to do a story on the growing number of homeless children last month and I got shut down. According to the last count, the numbers have been decreasing, but there’s been no change in policies, no extra funding to CPS, or shelters, or even an increase in the number of inmates in the juvenile detention center. So where are they going?” Detective Bruce Wayne may have the highest solve rate in Gotham, but if he wants to solve this case, he’ll need the help of an elusive street kid, and while Dick Grayson always lands on his feet, he usually lands himself right into trouble.

entry.title: Bad Influence
entry.summary:
Author: mustangisinflames

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,057Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 11

Summary: Batman opened his hand, splayed his fingers, metal claws catching moonlight with a flash, reflecting bright in reddened eyes at his feet. Criminals learned by example. Lessons needed to be taught, driven in hard if they had any chance of sticking. They needed to be shown what their choices led to, and what they led to was vengeance.‘Did you at least consider that he might be desperate? That he doesn’t want to sell drugs but has to?’Batman grit his teeth hard enough to grind at the thought of him. Olive coloured skin and dark blue eyes, black hair hanging in his face, half drowned by rain. A ridiculously bright suit that had as much of a place in Gotham as the alien wearing it did.Superman. Turns out Superman can have an influence even if he isn't there. Batman isn't pleased about it.

entry.title: Tentacles of Love
entry.summary:
Author: LadyArkin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,385Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 84

Summary: He wasn’t even offering much more than, “I need a favor, buddy.”Batman’s marriage proposal was sudden and…strategic.Once they’ve spent some time together, Batman talks Superman into marrying for a mission. A mission that Bruce declares to be entirely selfish which he needs for business purposes. This mission isn’t supposed to be impactful to either of their personal lives.It starts when Bruce releases pictures of Batman proposing to Superman. He didn’t need more than a distraction and if it hadn’t been for an intervention from their family and friends, it wouldn’t have been. The more involved their blended family gets into their relationship, the more that they are supported in their relationship.

entry.title: Moot Deliberation
entry.summary:
Author: quack_says_the_sane_one

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,611Chapters: 54/?Kudos: 1,399

Summary: Clark Kent has been Superman for a while now, and the last thing he expected to happen in that time was for him to develop feelings for the cold and distant Batman. But when his day job thrusts him into acquaintance with the billionaire Bruce Wayne, Clark thinks this new attraction will make the perfect distraction from his coworker. That is, until Batman begins acting strangely, almost as if his crush wasn’t as unrequited as he’d thought...Bruce Wayne likes to keep a healthy work-life balance. That means no friendships with his coworkers, especially not Mr. Goody Two-Shoes with his dark hair and his innocent act. And Bruce is positive it is an act - at least, until he runs into Mr. Goody Two-Shoes at a fundraiser, wearing jeans and a sweater instead of tights and a cape. But hey, Clark definitely doesn’t realize who he is, so maybe they can be friends outside of work. Superman doesn’t need to know his secret identity has been cracked; Bruce knows nothing if not how to keep a secret.

entry.title: Superhuman Sunshine (And Gotham's Dark Knight)
entry.summary:
Author: Coffee_Cats_Pomegranates

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,134Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Duty and desire don't mix.Batman is more than concerned about the oddly tranquil state of Gotham, he's never seen his city so quiet.That is, until Superman shows up with an explanation and a plea for assistance.Stubbornly clinging to lingering suspicion, Bruce finds himself working with Metropolis's Golden Boy to stop something that they find to be much bigger than they ever could have predicted.As they work together, Batman has to set aside his distrust, and with the rare opportunity of working in such close proximity, Batman finds that he enjoys Superman's presence much more than he thought he ever would.If he were anybody else.If they were anybody else.But duty and desire don't mix.Can they work through their weirdly heavy baggage?Can they set aside their character flaws?With so much at stake, will they ever risk taking the first step towards the other?Spoiler alert, they'll definitely try.

entry.title: Why doesn’t he want me, man?
entry.summary:
Author: BeelzebubsBois

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,875Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 33

Summary: After another fight between the dark knight and his son, during a particularly stressful night of patrol, Damian runs away to Dick’s house to ask for help. Long term help.Damian, Dick, and Wally learn to navigate life as a family with the help of Wally’s dads, Dick’s siblings, and a lot of trial and even more errors.But they never give up on the life they know they can build for themselves.

entry.title: From Start To End
entry.summary:
Author: NeptonicMistakes

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,655Chapters: 30/?Kudos: 216

Summary: A lot is story with some smut. If you want to read it and not have smut, chapters with it will be labeled and will have no major change to the story (the chapters of smut will just be smut, no extra things)Like the title, it starts at the beginning of Superman and Batman, before they are known to the public, before the robins. Before Bruce and Clark know one another and time goes on.Idk, this is sort of just a ramble and me getting my fixation to write out. Updates every Monday Night.Might be fanart at times??Lot more other relationships will be established as they come to. But main focus is Bruce and Clark
